Package src.pkg_rooms

Class Room

java.lang.Object
src.pkg_rooms.Room
Direct Known Subclasses:
TransporterRoom
public class Room extends Object
This class represents a room in the game with exits, items, characters, and doors / trapdoors.
Author:
Pierre MATAR

  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room(String pName, String pDescription, String pImage)
      Constructor for the room, initializes the description, exits, and items.
      Parameters:
      pName - The name of the room.
      pDescription - A brief description of the room.
      pImage - The image name associated with the room.

  • Method Details

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      Returns:
      A string representing the description of the room.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns:
      The name of the room.

    • getExit

      public Room getExit(String pDirection)
      Parameters:
      pDirection - The direction of the exit (e.g., "north", "south").
      Returns:
      The room in the specified direction, or null if there is no exit in that direction.

    • getExitString

      public String getExitString()
      Returns:
      A string listing all exits (e.g., "Exits: north south west").

    • getCharactersString

      public String getCharactersString()
      Returns:
      A string listing the names of all characters in the room, or an empty string if no characters are present.

    • getLongDescription

      public String getLongDescription()
      Returns:
      A detailed string description of the room.

    • setExit

      public void setExit(String pDirection, Room pNeighbor, boolean pIsLocked, Item pKeyDoor, boolean pIsTrapDoor)
      Sets an exit in a given direction, specifying whether it is a locked door or a trapdoor.
      Parameters:
      pDirection - The direction of the exit.
      pNeighbor - The neighboring room in the specified direction.
      pIsLocked - True if the door is locked, otherwise false.
      pKeyDoor - The key item required to open the door, or null if not needed.
      pIsTrapDoor - True if the exit is a trapdoor, otherwise false.

    • setExit

      public void setExit(String pDirection, Room pNeighbor)
      Sets an exit in a given direction without specifying trap door status. By default, the exit is not a trap door.
      Parameters:
      pDirection - The direction of the exit.
      pNeighbor - The neighboring room in the specified direction.

    • getImageName

      public String getImageName()
      Returns:
      The image file name.

    • isExit

      public boolean isExit(Room pRoom)
      Checks if a given room is one of the exits from the current room.
      Parameters:
      pRoom - The room to check.
      Returns:
      True if the specified room is an exit, otherwise false.

    • isTrapDoor

      public boolean isTrapDoor(String pDirection)
      Checks if the exit in a specified direction is a trap door.
      Parameters:
      pDirection - The direction to check.
      Returns:
      True if the exit is a trap door; otherwise, false.

    • isLockedDoor

      public boolean isLockedDoor(String pDirection)
      Checks if the exit in a specified direction is a locked door.
      Parameters:
      pDirection - The direction to check.
      Returns:
      True if the exit is a locked door, otherwise false.

    • getDoorKeyItemName

      public String getDoorKeyItemName(String pDirection)
      Parameters:
      pDirection - The direction of the door.
      Returns:
      The name of the key item required to open the door, or null if no key is required.

    • removeDirection

      public void removeDirection(String pDirection)
      Removes an exit in the specified direction.
      Parameters:
      pDirection - The direction to remove.

    • addItem

      public void addItem(Item pItem)
      Adds an item to the room.
      Parameters:
      pItem - The item to add to the room.

    • getItem

      public Item getItem(String pItemName)
      Retrieves an item from the room based on its name.
      Parameters:
      pItemName - The name of the item to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The item if it exists in the room; otherwise, null.

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem(String pItemName)
      Removes an item from the room based on its name.
      Parameters:
      pItemName - The name of the item to remove.

    • addCharacter

      public void addCharacter(Characterr pCharacter)
      Adds a character to the room.
      Parameters:
      pCharacter - The character to add.

    • removeCharacter

      public void removeCharacter(Characterr pCharacter)
      Removes a character from the room.
      Parameters:
      pCharacter - The character to remove.

    • getCharacter

      public Characterr getCharacter(String pCharacterName)
      Retrieves a character from the room by name.
      Parameters:
      pCharacterName - The name of the character to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The character if found, otherwise null.

    • getCharacters

      public Collection<Characterr> getCharacters()
      Returns:
      A collection of characters in the room.
